en.today: As the moon migrates into Taurus, you'll have a chance to slow down and review your current standing, Aries. Unfortunately, a harsh t-square between Luna, Mars, and Pluto could cause you to feel restricted, especially when it comes to creative expression and financial security. Rather than pressuring yourself to solve all of your problems at once, try to have compassion for yourself. Identify what issues can be handled at the moment, then work your way up from there. You'll feel more optimistic and refreshed once the new moon rises this afternoon, asking you to set intentions for the next six months.

en.today: A confident and resilient energy washes over you this morning, dearest Leo, as the moon enters Taurus and your solar tenth house. However, a harsh t-square between Luna, Mars, and Pluto could bring new challenges, especially when it comes to matters of the heart. A lack of commitment or different visions for the future may force you to address differences with that special someone. Advocate for what you need, but be willing to compromise and find a happy middle ground. You'll feel more optimistic about the possibilities that lie ahead once the new moon rises this afternoon.
